description: Temporarily shelves (stashes) changes you've made to your working copy so you can work on something else.
intent_phrases: save my work for now without committing
put my changes aside for later
how do I save my changes but not commit them yet

description: Shows a compressed, one-line view of the commit history.
intent_phrases: show me a short history of the commits
list all commits in a compact way
view the commit log on one line per commit

description: Creates a new branch and switches to it in one command.
intent_phrases: make a new branch and switch to it
create a new feature branch to work on
start a new line of work
how do I make a new branch

description: Undoes the most recent commit, keeping the changes in your working directory.
intent_phrases: undo the last commit I just made
I made a mistake in my last commit, how to undo it
